clauses.title: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations
clauses.description: After the end of the data retention period and/or if you request the deletion of your data, they may still keep it for business interests (fraud detection, transactions...) or legal obligations (tax, legal reporting...)
clauses.clause_text: During the normal course of doing business, we will continue to share your information among our business units, our affiliates and unaffiliated third parties as necessary in order to service your accounts and fill any orders you place with us.

case.text: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.
clauses.clause_text:
In addition, our retail partners, advertisers, and other third parties appearing at our site or linked to our site may use
their own cookies and beacons and may collect personally-identifiable information

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
clauses.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.
clauses.clause_text: We use your personally-identifying information to improve our marketing and promotional efforts

case.text: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

clauses.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text: As part of our service, we use cookies and beacons to store and sometimes track information about you.

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: Your data is processed and stored in a country that is less friendly to user privacy protection
clauses.description: This case means that user data is not anywhere in the world, but somewhere where it is more likely to be obtained and used by government and/or possible data analysts.
clauses.clause_text: We maintain information in the United States of America and in accordance with the laws of the United States, which may not provide the same level of protection as the laws in your jurisdiction. By using our website and providing us with information, you understand and agree that your information may be transferred to and stored on servers located outside your resident jurisdiction and, to the extent you are a resident of a country other than the United States, that you consent to the transfer of such data to the United States for processing by us in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

case.text: Your data is processed and stored in a country that is less friendly to user privacy protection

clauses.title: Extra data may be collected about you through promotions
clauses.description: Additional personal data may be collected through contests, surveys, promotions, petitions or sweepstakes.
clauses.clause_text:
We may ask you for personally-identifying information at other times, such as if you enter into a promotion, post
information, register for a forum, complete a survey,

case.text: Extra data may be collected about you through promotions

clauses.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
clauses.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.
clauses.clause_text:
We may also share the information we collect about you with third parties from one or more of the following categories, but only to the extent authorized by you, necessary to provide the goods or services you request, or as required by law.

  • Retailers
  • Credit Card Companies
  • Payment Processor Companies
  • Banks
  • Government Agencies

case.text: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you

clauses.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
clauses.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.
clauses.clause_text:
By using our website, you consent to the collection and use of this information in the manner described in this Privacy
Policy.

case.text: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.

clauses.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.
clauses.clause_text:
We may also share the information we collect about you with third parties from one or more of the following categories, but only to the extent authorized by you, necessary to provide the goods or services you request, or as required by law.

  • Retailers
  • Credit Card Companies
  • Payment Processor Companies
  • Banks
  • Government Agencies

case.text: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for advertising
clauses.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.

case.text: Your personal data is used for advertising

clauses.title: Logs are deleted after a finite period of time
clauses.description: Logs are text files containing some information about web visitors, such as user agents (showing for instance that you're connecting from Firefox for Android) and ip addresses (which reveal your approximate location). This case applies to Services that periodically delete their logs to prevent user sessions being tracked over time.
clauses.clause_text: Every seven days, our system will automatically erase any active backups, archives, or logs.

case.text: Logs are deleted after a finite period of time

clauses.title: You can delete your content from this service
clauses.description: You can ask the service to remove your content at any time, and it's deleted within a reasonable time.
clauses.clause_text: In some circumstances you have the right to the erasure of your personal data without undue delay.

case.text: You can delete your content from this service

clauses.title: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
clauses.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.
clauses.clause_text: Regardless of the type of data you chose to process with Astronomer, we will never hold on to any record, backup, archive, restorative files, cache, or anything of the like for longer than seven days.

case.text: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

clauses.title: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, you are notified at least 30 days in advance
clauses.description: The service may update the Terms without notice, but if they significantly change the agreements in a manner that importantly and/or negatively affects the way the service is used, users will be notified at least 30 days in advance.
clauses.clause_text:
Any changes to our Privacy Policy will be communicated through our website at least 30 days in advance of its
effective date.

case.text: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, you are notified at least 30 days in advance

clauses.title: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
clauses.clause_text:
At the time you register on our site, we may collect and store your name, email address, mailing address, and other
personally-identifying information.

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: Your browser's Do Not Track (DNT) headers are respected
clauses.description: This service does respect the browser's Do Not Track header and disables all user tracking if it is enabled.
clauses.clause_text:
If your browser or similar mechanism gives
our site a “do not track” signal, our site will make commercially reasonable attempts to honor your settings (although
we still may deliver and use cookies and other tracking technologies for non-marketing purposes).

case.text: Your browser's Do Not Track (DNT) headers are respected

clauses.title: The service explains how to prevent disclosure of personal information to third parties
clauses.clause_text:
You will always have the option of not
permitting the transfer by not using the particular services for which the information is collected or shared.

case.text: The service explains how to prevent disclosure of personal information to third parties

clauses.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising
clauses.description: The service employs your data to target ads to you, but you can opt-out of this interest-based advertising.
clauses.clause_text:
We may use your information to deliver information to you that, in some cases, is targeted to your interests, such as
articles, targeted banners, new services, advertisements, and promotions.
You can opt out of receiving this
information by so indicating in your registration/preferences file or otherwise notifying us in writing.

case.text: You can opt out of targeted advertising

clauses.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.
clauses.clause_text: European Union GDPR Rights

case.text: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.
clauses.clause_text: Your account can be deleted or deactivated,

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time

clauses.title: A free help desk is provided
clauses.description: The service can be easily contacted for questions or provides a support center at no extra cost.
clauses.clause_text:
To update,
correct, or delete this information, you can contact us via email at humans@astronomer.io.

case.text: A free help desk is provided

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: LAST UPDATED: January 2019

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
clauses.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.
clauses.clause_text: In addition, we automatically gather general statistical information about our website and visitors, such as IP addresses, browsers, pages viewed, number of visitors, goods and services purchased, etc., but in doing so we do not reference you by individual name, email address, home address, or telephone number. We use this data in the aggregate to determine how much our users use parts of our site so we can improve our site.

case.text: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
